App Description for "Become a Queen"

Brief: "Become a Queen" is an enchanting game that invites players to embrace the regal adventure of rising through the ranks to royal splendor. This game offers a unique blend of strategy, fashion, and decision-making as players navigate the complexities of courtly life with the ultimate aim of becoming a queen.
